chat.title: Chat
chat.welcomeMessage: How can I help you today?
chat.fallbackWarning: Due to connection issues to the prompt database, the system is based on a previous version
chat.topicChangeMessage: Your current conversation is about a different topic. Would you like to start a new topic thread?

projects.title: Projects
projects.name: Project name
projects.deleteConfirm: Delete project "{name}"? This will delete all topics and conversations in this project.

topics.name: Topic name
topics.deleteConfirm: Delete topic "{name}"? This will delete all conversations in this topic.
